mapper.select: select t1.yesterdayOrderNo as orderNo, t1.beforeYesterdayOrderNo as beforeYesterdayOrderNo, t1.averScore as score, imgUrl, t2.id as familyId, t2.familyName as name from familyScore t1 right join familyInfo t2 on (t1.familyId=t2.id) where t2.createUserId=#{userId} and t1.startDay<=#{timeStr} and t1.endDay>=#{timeStr}
select familyId from userFamilyRelation where userId=#{userId} order by id asc

select t1.yesterdayOrderNo as orderNo, t1.beforeYesterdayOrderNo as beforeYesterdayOrderNo, t1.averScore as score, imgUrl, t2.id as familyId, t2.familyName as name from familyScore t1 right join familyInfo t2 on (t1.familyId=t2.id) where t2.id=#{familyId} and t1.startDay<=#{timeStr} and t1.endDay>=#{timeStr}

select imgUrl, t3.familyId as familyId, t3.yesterdayOrderNo as orderNo, t3.beforeYesterdayOrderNo as beforeYesterdayOrderNo, t2.familyName as name, t3.averScore as score from familyInfo t2 join familyScore t3 on (t2.id=t3.familyId) where t3.startDay<=#{timeStr} and t3.endDay>=#{timeStr} and t3.yesterdayOrderNo !=0 order by t3.yesterdayOrderNo asc limit 0, 100
select imgUrl, familyName from familyInfo where id=#{familyId}
select yesterdayOrderNo from familyScore where familyId=#{familyId} and startDay<=#{timeStr} and endDay>=#{timeStr}
select record from familyHistory where familyId=#{familyId} order by id desc limit 0, 3
select yesterdayOrderNo, endDay from familyScore where familyId=#{familyId} order by endDay asc

select imgUrl, t1.nickName as name, t1.phone as phone, t1.id as userId, t2.role as role, joinTime from usersAccount t1 join userFamilyRelation t2 on (t1.id=t2.userId) where t2.familyId = #{familyId} order by joinTime asc

select t1.score as score, t2.role as role, t2.daystamp as dayStr from userScoreDayStat t1 join userFamilyRoleLog t2 on (t1.userFamilyScoreId=t2.id) where t1.userId=#{userId} and t2.familyId=#{familyId} order by t2.daystamp desc limit #{start}, 10
select avgScore from userScoreDayStat where userId=#{memberId} and familyId=#{familyId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
select role from userFamilyRoleLog where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId} and daystamp=#{day}
select role from userFamilyRelation where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId}
select score, speedingState, driveState, creditState, steadyState, mileageState from userScoreDayStat where userId=#{userId} and daystamp=#{day} and userFamilyScoreId=#{userFamilyScoreId}

select t1.id as userId, t1.nickName as name, t1.phone as phone, t1.imgUrl as imgUrl, t2.role as role from usersAccount t1 join userFamilyRelation t2 on (t1.id=t2.userId) where familyId=#{familyId} order by t2.id asc
select id as userFamilyScoreId from userFamilyRoleLog where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
select id as userFamilyScoreId from userFamilyRoleLog where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId}
select score from userScoreDayStat where userId=#{userId} and userFamilyScoreId=#{userFamilyScoreId}
select * from familyDriveDayStat where familyId=#{familyId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}

select time, mileage, startTime, endTime, id as travelId, habitId, userId, createTime from userTravelHistory where userId=#{userId} and endTime>=#{startTime} and endTime<=#{endTime} order by startTime desc
select startTime, endTime from userFamilyRoleLog where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
select time, mileage, nightDrive, turnTimes, tiredDrive, speedTimes, brakeTimes, maxspeed, overspeedTimes from userTravelHistory where id=#{travelId}
select t1.* from userScoreDayStat t1 join userFamilyRoleLog t2 on (t1.userFamilyScoreId=t2.id) where t1.userId=#{userId} and t1.daystamp=#{day} and t2.familyId=#{familyId}

select orderNo, date_format(str_to_date(daystamp, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y/%m/%d') as daystamp from familyDriveDayStat where daystamp>=#{startDay} and daystamp<=#{endDay} and familyId=#{familyId} order by daystamp asc
select startDay, endDay from familyScore where familyId=#{familyId} order by endDay desc
select nickName, phone, imgUrl, createTime from usersAccount where id=#{id}
select sum(mileage) as totalMileage from userScoreDayStat where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId}
select sum(time) as totalTime from userScoreDayStat where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId}
